full_summary:
### 5P435-235054 Bulk Road Salt

#### Solicitation Details
- **Reference Number**: WS4002251194-Doc4002274566
- **Amendment Number**: 1
- **Solicitation Number**: WS4002251194
- **Publication Date**: May 15, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date**: June 9, 2023 at 2:00 PM EDT
- **Status**: Cancelled ( previously amended )

#### Tender Overview
A request for standing offer for the supply and delivery of bulk coarse road salt for use in regular winter maintenance on the Trans Canada and other highways in various National Parks of Canada.

#### Regions of Delivery
- Banff
- Revelstoke

#### Contract Details
- **Procurement Category**: Government of Canada (General Department - GD)
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
- **According to trade agreements**: applicable to several countries including Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), and others (full list provided in original text)

#### Posting Details
- **Notice URL**: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16262628?extsite=MTYyNjI2MjhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16262628?extsite=MTYyNjI2MjhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

#### Bid Submission Details
- All bid submissions must be submitted on or before June 9, 2023 at 2:00 PM EDT. 
- Any bids submitted after this time will not be considered.

#### Contracting Entity
- **Contracting Entity Name**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) / Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)
- **Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5

#### Point of Contact
- **Name**: Wiebe, Lyland (SPAC/PSPC)
- **Email**: lyland.wiebe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
- **Phone**: none
- **Fax**: none

#### End-User Entity
-
